com.stefanbrenner.droplet.utils
Class DropletDimensions

java.lang.Object
  com.stefanbrenner.droplet.utils.DropletDimensions

public final class DropletDimensions
extends java.lang.Object

Droplet dimension utilities.

This class provides static utility methods to dimension the ui.

Author:
Stefan Brenner
